CmdLine: apt-get update -y   && apt-get install apt-transport-https -y   && curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add -   && echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list   && apt-get update -y   && apt-get install yarn=1.3.2-1 -y   && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
